divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend told me that he'd been seeing ufos and taking their pictures. He emailed me some pictures and I went over to see if I'd see one. I was looking South from Vancouver, WA when I observed a white light that looked like a star, but it was below the atmosphere. It hovered there for a couple minutes and then began changing colors. It did this for about 2 or 3 more minutes, then it took off horizontally to the east at a high rate of speed.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around September 23rd 2011
Summary: I saw a bright light that looked like a star. it was stationary for a couple minutes. It started changing colors from orange to red to yellow
